      static play.mvc.Result ajaxDeleteLearner(java.lang.String learnerUUID)
      This does not perform a cascading delete on sessions.
      static play.mvc.Result getLearners()
      Retrieves learners owned by the coordinator or all learners if accessed by an admin.
      static play.mvc.Result updateLearner(java.lang.String learnerUUID)
      NOTE: This method can change the learner's email, even though the Learner schema uses it as an ID! Changes will be propogated to the learner's sessions.

        public LearnerController()

    • Method Detail

      • getLearners

        public static play.mvc.Result getLearners()
        Retrieves learners owned by the coordinator or all learners if accessed by an admin.
        Returns:

      • updateLearner

        public static play.mvc.Result updateLearner(java.lang.String learnerUUID)
        NOTE: This method can change the learner's email, even though the Learner schema uses it as an ID! Changes will be propogated to the learner's sessions. On success, returns the entire Learner entity as JSON.
        Parameters:
        learnerUUID - The UUID cooresponding to the learner. It is another unique key in addition to the email.

      • ajaxDeleteLearner

        public static play.mvc.Result ajaxDeleteLearner(java.lang.String learnerUUID)
        This does not perform a cascading delete on sessions. Instead, it frees the learner's sessions.
